skillTree.name: Wind Harmony
skillTree.description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.

skillTree.name: Ranged Discipline
skillTree.description: The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.

skillTree.name: Mark Target
skillTree.description: Those marked for death by Nanye find their armour and shield of little practical use…

skillTree.name: Moment of Perfect Yin
skillTree.description: Being taught to shoot shortly after learning to walk means that by adulthood Nanye's bullets are true and their eyesight is as acute as the swooping hawk.

skillTree.name: Kill Shot
skillTree.description: There’s no need to rush when your target has little prospect of escape.

ui_effects.description: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

target_if: Unit is not composed of a single entity

skillTree.name: Hawkish Precision
skillTree.description: The truly hawk-eyed always hit their targets. Always.

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

skillTree.name: Whistling Bullets
skillTree.description: The notched bullets that fire from Nanye's rifle howl as they scream across the battlefield, letting everyone know that they will soon be dead. Others soon take up the challenge and copy the whistling bullets.

effects.description:
Enables Cower in Fear attacks for Crane Gunners.
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Practice Makes Perfect
skillTree.description: As with so many other snipers, the more that Nanye shoots, the more their eye hones in on the target.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

skillTree.name: Always Ready
skillTree.description: Death is always just a shot away.

skillTree.name: Blacker Powder
skillTree.description: "It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."

skillTree.name: Powder Monkey
skillTree.description: "Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"

skillTree.name: Requisition
skillTree.description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

skillTree.name: Gunsight
skillTree.description: A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.

skillTree.name: Triangulation
skillTree.description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

skillTree.name: Defensive Coordinator
skillTree.description: Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for towers during siege battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Sapper
skillTree.description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ballistics Instructor
skillTree.description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Nanye Bunyo
backgroundSkills.description: A dead-eyed sniper from the northern expanses of Cathay, Nanye grew up hunting all manner of beast and man. Noted for his skill even from a young age, his ability with a rifle has been tutored and trained by the very best Grand Cathay has to offer... until he's become the best they've ever seen.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Crane Gunners and Iron Hail Gunners units
	(all units in army)
